body_html:
Yes that's exactly what I'm confused about.
Since they're suppose to be two separated shared libs, we must have different switches for them so that gpu lib can dllimport those things in cpu lib.

Yes that's exactly what I'm confused about.
Since they're suppose to be two separated shared libs, we must have different switches for them so that gpu lib can dllimport those things in cpu lib.
